resources.string: mOnionO is a mobile Onionoo client which can be used to search and display information about Tor nodes. The client is based on the Android platform.
If you need any further information, please visit the project homepage at http://code.google.com/p/moniono or contact us through email at moniono@gmx.net.

The Onionoo project defines a protocol to request status information about nodes of the Tor network. This information is published through a web server being part of the Onionoo project. Information is distributed via HTTPS. The Onionoo project itself makes use of information on nodes being directly obtained from The Tor Project.
Tor is a registered trademark of The Tor Project, Inc., Android is a trademark of Google Inc.
